医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究颠覆了人们对帕金森病病因的普遍看法西北医学的一项新研究挑战了人们对帕金森病发病原因的普遍看法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/Study-upends-common-belief-in-what-triggers-Parkinsons-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/Study-upends-common-belief-in-what-triggers-Parkinsons-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e23a3e20-01a9-469d-bce7-e6fb295ed865 Fri, 15 Sep 2023 14:45:55 -0400 Study upends common belief in what triggers Parkinson's disease
加州立法者批准全国领先的卫生工作者 25 美元最低工资劳工和卫生行业之间达成的一项全面协议将逐步将加州数十万卫生工作者的最低工资提高到全国领先的每小时 25 美元，同时结束长达数年的透析诊所之争。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/California-lawmakers-approve-nation-leading-2425-minimum-wage-for-health-workers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/California-lawmakers-approve-nation-leading-2425-minimum-wage-for-health-workers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=39e2cd1b-d43c-4c09-b47e-625f9af98bdb Fri, 15 Sep 2023 14:37:03 -0400 California lawmakers approve nation-leading $25 minimum wage for health workers
波士顿大学研究人员获得美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 资助，用于识别阿尔茨海默病的遗传因素美国国立卫生研究院/国家老龄化研究所最近向波士顿大学 Chobanian & Avedisian 医学院首席研究员、生物医学遗传学首席研究员、杰出遗传学教授 Lindsay Farrer 博士和 Richard Sherva 领导的一个项目提供了 1370 万美元的资助。博士，生物医学遗传学助理教授，使用全基因组测序和其他方法来识别目前居住在以色列的犹太人阿尔茨海默病 (AD) 的遗传因素，这些犹太人的祖先可以追溯到西班牙南部以及中东和北部地区非洲（中东和北非）和以色列的阿拉伯公民。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/BU-researchers-receive-NIH-grant-to-identify-genic-factors-for-Alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/BU-researchers-receive-NIH-grant-to-identify-genic-factors-for-Alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=944c8074-919f-474a-b339-64452e1f8f1d Fri, 15 Sep 2023 14:33:22 -0400 BU researchers receive NIH grant to identify genetic factors for Alzheimer's disease
普渡大学研究人员获得 138 万美元用于对抗发展中国家的耐药性疟疾普渡大学的一名研究人员在发展中国家对抗耐药疟疾菌株方面取得了巨大的飞跃。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/Purdue-researcher-receives-24138-million-to-fight-against-drug-pressive-malaria-in-developing-countries.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/Purdue-researcher-receives-24138-million-to-fight-against-drug-pressive-malaria-in-developmenting-countries.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6ab014e9-d4d5-4306-a56b-f6068627de08 Fri, 15 Sep 2023 14:23:02 -0400 Purdue researcher receives $1.38 million to fight against drug-resistant malaria in developing countries
Moderna 针对 Omicron XBB.1.5 的改编 COVID-19 疫苗已获得 MHRA 批准Moderna (Spikevax) 的一款针对 Omicron XBB 1.5 子变体的改良型 COVID-19 疫苗今天获得了英国药品和保健品监管机构 (MHRA) 的授权，因为该疫苗符合英国监管机构的安全、质量和有效性标准。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/Modernae28099s-adapted-COVID-19-vaccine-that-targets-Omicron-XBB15-approved-by-MHRA.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/Modernae28099s-adapted-COVID-19-vaccine-that-targets-Omicron-XBB15-approved-by-MHRA.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ffdc1d42-6a5f-4680-9273-ef05282aa216 Fri, 15 Sep 2023 14:09:43 -0400 Moderna’s adapted COVID-19 vaccine that targets Omicron XBB.1.5 approved by MHRA
研究调查了哪些因素阻碍和促进了大学生健康的性行为大学奥委会与几所智利大学合作开展的一项研究调查了大学生在性健康问题上面临的困难，并提出了改进旨在促进健康性行为的活动的具体措施。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/Study-examines-what-hinders-and-what-promotes-healthy-sex-behaviors-among-university-students.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/Study-examines-what-hinders-and-what-promotes-healthy-sex-behaviors-among-university-students.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2692b34f-35a8-418f-a0b7-34dd7dbf1f0f Fri, 15 Sep 2023 13:48:03 -0400 Study examines what hinders and what promotes healthy sexual behaviors among university students
NICER：用于基因编辑的 CRISPR/Cas9 的更安全替代方案基因编辑技术 CRISPR/Cas9 使研究人员能够对生物体的 DNA 进行精确且有效的改变，以修复导致遗传疾病的突变。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/NICER-A-safer-alternative-to-CRISPRCas9-for-gene-editing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/NICER-A-safer-alternative-to-CRISPRCas9-for-gene-editing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bc554793-6c49-408d-a529-3c33f7c8b33e Fri, 15 Sep 2023 12:12:53 -0400 NICER: A safer alternative to CRISPR/Cas9 for gene editing
加州立法机关通过了州长纽瑟姆关于重组心理健康服务法案的提案加州立法机关通过了两项法案，批准了州长加文·纽瑟姆 (Gavin Newsom) 修建 10,000 张新床位和住房以及增加毒瘾治疗的运动，作为应对该州无家可归和毒品危机的一部分。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/California-Legislature-passes-Gov-Newsome28099s-proposal-to-retool-mental-health-services-act.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/California-Legislature-passes-Gov-Newsome28099s-proposal-to-retool-mental-health-services-act.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=56f6a6a7-39c2-4fe4-8768-b97bfb672d2a Fri, 15 Sep 2023 12:04:00 -0400 California Legislature passes Gov. Newsom’s proposal to retool mental health services act
Ducor Petrochemicals 推出符合 ISO 13485 认证的医疗保健和生命科学应用产品系列Ducor Petrochemicals 是聚丙烯塑料开发的全球合作伙伴，开发了专门用于生产医疗设备和其他生命科学应用的产品系列。 DuCare 产品系列经过 ISO 13485 认证，专为医疗保健和生命科学应用而设计。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/Ducor-Petrochemicals-launches-product-range-for-Healthcare-Life-Science-applications-under-ISO-13485-certification.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/Ducor-Petrochemicals-launches-product-range-for-Healthcare-Life-Science-applications-under-ISO-13485-certification.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cc08e360-094c-417f-b52b-9554632e1066 Fri, 15 Sep 2023 09:02:00 -0400 Ducor Petrochemicals launches product range for Healthcare & Life Science applications under ISO 13485 certification
专家为癌症相关疼痛患者提供阿片类药物管理指导治疗癌症相关疼痛的临床医生必须考虑是否以及如何向使用可卡因和甲基苯丙胺等非医疗兴奋剂的患者开阿片类药物；然而，没有与这些常见和具有挑战性的情况相关的指导方针。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/Experts-provide-guidance-on-opioid-management-in-individuals-with-cancer-lated-pain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230915/Experts-provide-guidance-on-opioid-management-in-individuals-with-cancer-lated-pain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2af833f0-ed3b-4136-8194-3392afca6753 Fri, 15 Sep 2023 08:59:00 -0400 Experts provide guidance on opioid management in individuals with cancer-related pain
